page.title: 12TRANSPORT,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: { Carew is a rural area.}The main shopping areas are at least 6 miles away. Car owning is important.{Over 80% of {the householders are car owners,}with 50% using the car for work.{40% have {more than 1 car. { The Pembroke Dock to Tenby bus route {passes through the area,}but it is not a regular service and is probably subsidised by the County Council. An {Express Coach passes once a day on the {Haverfordwest to Bristol route.}About 40% of the children at Primary level travel by bus to school and the majority of Secondary School children. { The main Pembroke Dock road passes {through the area.}It is busy with heavy lorries and tankers _ about 40 an hour. There were 2 petrol stations but 1 is now closed.
